author: chris-dollin
msg: Renamed WrapepdRuleReasonerFactory to WrappedRuleFactory, since we now
deal with any reasoner factory. Updated the release notes.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Node_Variables now print themselces out more nicely. TestModelSpecrevised
is now using a "template with insertions" for making its models.

author: chris-dollin
msg: reasonerSpecs can now specify schema models which will be loaded into
the reasoner when it is created.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Folded the new rule-specification code into InfModelSpecs so that now
we can have ModelSpecs that describe inference models with rules.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Added FrontsTriple as a way of abstracting out the dependency of
Statements on Triples for more general use.
